src:
Cari Rumah DP Rp 0? Datang Saja ke FPI
06 Nov 2019, 08:12 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Tim Infografis, Mindra Purnomo

Jakarta - Rumah123.com menggelar Festival Properti Indonesia (FPI) di Kota Kasablanka (Kokas) mulai dari 6-10 November 2019. Di FPI ini, milenial hingga orang tua bisa beli rumah dengan uang muka atau DP (Down Payment) Rp 0."Di FPI ini kita memberikan banyak meudahan, mulai dari pembeliannya, pembayarannya. Bahkan ada DP yang cuma Rp 0. Jadi kalau ditanyakan apa, ya sudah pasti pemilihan rumahnya banyak, begitu juga dengan apartemen, condotel. Dengan pilihan payment-nya juga, cara belinya juga banyak, dan hadiahnya banyak. Jadi semua bisa didapatkan di sini," jelas Country Manager Rumah123.com, Maria Herawati Manik, dalam pembukaan FPI 2019, di Mal Kota Kasablanka, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Selain menawarkan rumah dengan DP Rp 0, di FPI ini pengunjung juga bisa mendapatkan penawaran seperti gratis biaya Bea Perolehan Hak atas Tanah dan Bangunan (BPHTB), Akta Jual Beli (AJB), dan provisi bank. Lalu, di FPI ini pengunjung bisa mendapatkan subsii rumah puluhan juta.Dalam festival ini, Rumah123.com menggaet 26 developer seperti Metland, Trans Park, Paradise Serpong City, Synthesis Homes, dan sebagainya.Dalam kesempatan yang sama, General Manager Marketing Rumah123.com Fanny Meiliana menuturkan, nantinya, pengunjung yang bertransaksi properti dalam festival ini pun bisa mendapatkan cashback hingga Rp 100 juta."Kenapa kita kasih cashback? Karena biasanya habis beli rumah kan uang kita tersedot habis-habisan. Nah ketika ada cash back itu bisa dimanfaatkan si pembeli sesuai kebutuhan masin-masing2. Apakah untuk mengisi rumahnya, atau jalan-jalan, dan lain-lain," terang Fanny.Dalam FPI ini, properti yang ditawarkan memiliki keragaman harga. Untuk apartemen sendiri, harganya dimulai dari Rp 290 juta sampai Rp 3 miliar. Untuk rumah tapak sendiri ditawarkan dari harga Rp 300 juta hingga Rp 3 miliar.Simak Video "Pemesan DP Rp 0 Punya Harley, Anies Pastikan Sesuai Kriteria"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
Looking for Rp. DP Houses? Just come to FPI
Nov 6 2019, 08:12 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Infographic Team, Mindra Purnomo

Jakarta - Rumah123.com is holding an Indonesian Property Festival (FPI) in Kota Kasablanka (Kokas) starting from 6-10 November 2019. At this FPI, millennials to parents can buy a house with a down payment or down payment of Rp 0. " In FPI, we provide a lot of facilities, starting from the purchase, payment, and there is even a DP that is only Rp 0. So if asked what, it is certain that the selection of houses is many, as well as apartments, condotels. also many, and many prizes. So all can be found here, "explained Rumah123.com Country Manager, Maria Herawati Manik, in the opening of FPI 2019, in Kota Kasablanka Mall, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). In addition to offering homes with a DP of Rp 0, in this FPI visitors can also get offers such as free of charge for acquiring land and building rights (BPHTB), Deed of Sale (AJB), and bank provisions. Then, in this FPI visitors can get tens of millions of homes. In this festival, Rumah123.com attracts 26 developers such as Metland, Trans Park, Paradise Serpong City, Synthesis Homes, and so on. On the same occasion, General Manager of Marketing Rumah123.com Fanny Meiliana said, later, visitors who transact property in this festival can get cashback of up to Rp. 100 million. "Why do we give cashback? Because usually after buying a house, our money is sucked up completely. Now when there is cash back, it can be utilized buyers according to their respective needs. Whether to fill his house, or the streets, etc., "explained Fanny. In this FPI, the offered property has a variety of prices. For the apartment itself, the price starts from Rp. 290 million to Rp. 3 billion. For the site itself, the price is offered from Rp. 300 million to Rp. 3 billion. Watch the video "Ordering DP Rp. 0 Have Harley, Anies Make Sure it fits the Criteria" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fdl / fdl)
